Evaluating a news article with Natural language processing

Instructions:

  1. Type the URL of the article you want us to analyze.
  2. When you click the button the result will appear.
  3. The score tag determines if the tone of the article is positive or negative.
  4. The Confidence Score, or Classification Threshhold, indicates how certain the NLP Service / Machine Learning Model is that the respective intent has been assigned correctly. The score can have a value between 0 and 100.
  5. The agreement value refers to harmony or accordance in the opinions or feelings expressed in the article.
